text: Dual is an upcoming science fiction film written and directed by Riley Stearns. ==Premise== A woman who has herself cloned upon learning she will soon die is court ordered to duel her clone after she recovers miraculously and she fails to decommission the clone. ==Cast== *Karen Gillan *Aaron Paul *Jesse Eisenberg *Beulah Koale *Martha Kelly ==Production== The film was announced in April 2020, with Karen Gillan, Aaron Paul and Jesse Eisenberg cast.Karen Gillan, Aaron Paul, Jesse Eisenberg Set For Sci-Fi Thriller ‘Dual’ Principal photography began in October 2020. ==References== ==External links== *Dual at the Internet Movie Database Category:Upcoming English-language films
title: Dual (upcoming film)
